action.action-desc: Mr. Cotton introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funding for research centers and laboratories in which nationals of countries of concern conduct agricultural research.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bioweapon Prevention Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on funding for research centers and laboratories in which nationals of countries of concern conduct agricultural research

subsection.text: No Federal funding shall be available to any research center or laboratory in which a national of a country of concern conducts agricultural research.
In this section, the term country of concern meansâ€”

paragraph.text: the People's Republic of China, including the Special Administrative Region of Hong Kong and the Special Administrative Region of Macau;
the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela; and
the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
